```{r}
library(purrr)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)

t1_features <- fread("data/Ticker1.csv")
t1_directions <- fread("data/Ticker1_label.csv")
t1_features$tm <- floor(t1_features$Timestamp / 1000)

df <- t1_features %>% group_by(tm, Side) %>% summarise(
  O = map(as.numeric(strsplit(Level1, 'x')[[1]][1]), 1)
  C = tail(as.numeric(strsplit(Level10, 'x')[[1]][1]), 1)
  V = sum()
)

plot

```
